snippet.title: Heroes Infinity Android Gameplay
snippet.description:
Heroes Infinity by DIVMOB (ANDROID/iOS/iphone/ipad)
►►► SUBSCRIBE PROAPK FOR MORE GAMES : http://goo.gl/dlfmS0 ◄◄◄
A stunning action RPG filled with heroics, adventure, and a diverse assortment of creatures and fiends.
Dive into the world of Heroes Infinity and begin your your epic journey throughout many lands and cities. Collect & build up your epic heroes team to achieve victory.

[ Features ]

EPIC GODS WAR
- A real-time strategy battle filled with dynamic effects and diverse skill animations.
- Many of heroes are waiting for you to Unlock & Combine them into a powerful team.

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
- Power Up, Tier Up, Rank Up and Gear Up to prepare your heroes in their War for Justice.
- Summon your heroes wisely to gain the Victory for the upcoming battles.

NUMEROUS GAME MODES
- Adventure Mode: Gain Experiences & Level Up your heroes by defeating your enemies.
- Sky Scraper: Challenge your epic team limit by conquering many of increasing difficulty Levels.
- Star Gates: Collect piece of all the heroes shards to Summon the mystery heroes.
- Training Field: Bring out your own skill control with heroes in battles to gain the victory.
- Boss Party: Battle with legendary bosses and gain the unique rewards.
- Super Boss: Stay focus when the boss coming. Your epic team have to fight it hard.

DRAMATIC PVP Battles!!
- Prove your team strength & strategy in the 5 vs 5 battle!
- Compete with other players in the leader board and make your way to the top PvP.

GUILDS & COMMUNICATION!!
- Form up with other players into a Guild
- Fight together and gain legendary rewards
- Build up your Guild to become the most powerful Guild in the world

DOWNLOAD

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.divmob.heroesinfinity&hl=en

Total Size : 136 Mb

✔ LOOKING FOR MORE RPG GAMES?  ►►► https://goo.gl/wqCfuv ◄◄◄

----------------------------------------------------
SUBSCRIBE PROAPK TO DISCOVER MORE NEW ANDROID/iOS GAMES : http://goo.gl/dlfmS0
